text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: Maps ProductTypeGeenCodelijst codes as found in the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) MedicalDevice v4.0 (2024)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/MedicalDevice-v4.0(2024EN)) to AbsentOrUnknownDevicesUvIps as found in [The International Patient Summary v1.1.0](https://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/index.html) on `Device.type`.
